actionCalls.name: Send_Email_to_Content_Studio_POC
actionCalls.label: Send Email to Content Studio POC

formulas.name: f_Test_Note
formulas.expression: TEXT({!$Flow.CurrentDateTime}) & " - " & IF({!Send_Email_Back_To_Available}=True, "Sent Back to Available" & "; ", "") & IF({!Send_Email_Creating_Treatment}=True, "Sent Creating Treatment" & "; ", "") & IF({!Send_Email_Expired}=True, "Sent Expired" & "; ", "") & IF({!Send_Email_Now_Available}=True, "Sent Now Available" & "; ", "") & IF({!Send_Email_Pending_Opp}=True, "Sent Pending Opp" & "; ", "") & IF({!Send_Email_Purchased}=True, "Sent Purchased" & "; ", "") & IF({!Send_Email_to_Content_Studio_POC}=True, "Sent to Content Studio POC" & "; ", "") & IF({!Send_Email_to_New_Owner}=True, "Sent to New Owner" & "; ", "") & IF({!Send_Email_to_Requester}=True, "Sent to Requester" & "; ", "") & IF({!Send_Email_to_Sales}=True, "Sent to Sales" & "; ", "") & IF({!Send_Email_to_Treatment_Owner}=True, "Sent to Treatment Owner" & "; ", "") & IF({!Send_Email_to_Treatment_Owner1}=True, "Sent to Treatment Owner 1" & "; ", "")

recordUpdates.name: Add_Treatment_to_Client_Purchased_Opp
recordUpdates.label: Add Treatment to Client Purchased Opp

recordUpdates.label: Change Status to Void on Client Purchased
